attributes.action: Stop You Tube From Downloading Music for Free!!
attributes.additional_details:
You tube are now making music so easily accessible it is scary for all artists not only in dance music but every genre in the world.

i find this a big middle finger to all artists and performers if music becomes this easy to obtain then it's going to stop alot of young producers and new labels from getting off the ground.

we need this to spread please share if you feel passionate about this subject and let's try stop this before it get's worse this really could be the beginning of the end.

think of your favourite vinyl maybe it's worth over £100 and it's treasured to you...well i can now get that for free surely thats not right?

IN THE NAME OF HOUSE MUSIC LET'S DO THIS TOGETHER!
